attributes.action: If we are in this together, David Cameron can practice what he preaches and do his job for free
attributes.additional_details:
Let's show David Cameron how we feel about his patronizing statements about the "Big Society". He launched this initiative, to encourage unemployed and disabled people to work for free exclaiming "we're in this together!"

Sign this petition, if you think multi-millionaire David Cameron should practice what he preaches and lead by example, by taking no payment for doing his job as Prime Minister. Lets put a stop to it being one rule for them, and another for us.

We need 100,000 signatures to get this debated in the House of Commons. The media will DEFINITELY highlight what was said. It would make very interesting viewing.
